t: Brand new shoes fell apart, replaced by Amazon
s: I can't believe that I just wore these shoes for the first time (got them last week) and they're falling apart. I walked less than 100 yards and the soles are coming off. The glue failed. I think these were old stock that Amazon sent me or a manufacturing defect.

t: Undone: When Coming Apart Puts You Back Together: Truax, Laura Sumner: 9780830843060: Amazon.com: Books
s: Wherever you are on the spiritual path, there is wisdom here for the journey. ... Undone: When Coming Apart Puts You Back Together, as the title indicates, focuses on stripping ourselves of masks and facades, or literally becoming undone, in order to allow ourselves to be what God wants us to be.

t: Amazon.com: Didn't See That Coming: Putting Life Back Together When Your World Falls Apart: 9780063010529: Hollis, Rachel: Books
I love the product BUT...it's coming apart. The bottom seam is really coming apart.
s: I got it 12/17/2016 BUT it's already coming apart at the seams, especially at the waist. I love the product. It's comfy and it makes me feel safe riding around with the CE padding snug on my body, but at this rate, the 3DF won't last six months. Will send pix to back up claim.

t: Amazon
s: That happened to me last September, twice, about 2 weeks apart. Random items sent to my address but with someone else’s name. I tried to search for that name online, thinking that maybe they just had the wrong “city state zip” but the correct street address, but found nothing. Amazon told me not to send them back but to keep them. All 5 or 6 items were not able to be found anywhere on Amazon.com. They all had Chinese written all over them and no barcodes and no brand ...

t: Returns - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you need to return or replace an item, visit Your Orders and select 'Return or Replace Items' on the relevant order. You can find help topics on this page such as how to replace broken and missing items, returning your order, and how to resolve refund issues.

t: Is Amazon falling apart?
s: Has anyone got an email address ... off my back and let me take care of my business and my customers, and to maybe get more than 4 hours sleep? So please people…come with some advice? Should I just hand Amazon the keys…or throw in the towel? And by the way, if you have read this far…then you deserve a round of applause. ... Is Amazon falling apart at the ...
